name: Our First Game
description: This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. This is my first game jam and first game overall made with less than a month of experience in Unity. Feel free to leave comments, criticisms, advice, and angry reactions, all are welcome and helpful (usually).  Can't wait for the next GMTK Game Jam where I might actually know what I'm doing by then (maybe (hopefully (probably not))).
